messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: consensual  living - choices
messages.msgSnippet: snip~ My first choice is not to cook today at all, and I kinda wish someone would come and cook for me.  But my wishing isn t going to make it happen.  And
messages.messageBody:
snip~ "My first choice is not to cook today at all, and I kinda wish
someone would come and cook for me. But my wishing isn't going to make it
happen. And I'll probably cook something later on. <g> Not my first choice. But I will choose to do it. Not REALLY what I want, but what I will settle for.

i often feel this way...
the way i would explain it is...

Because of choices i made earlier in the day (week, year, etc) i'm going to cook tonight, even though i don't really feel like it.

On the other hand, it probably won't be one of my better meals!
---linda



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
